fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Enlargement, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: NATCOL follows all the legislation mainly in the scientific regulatory framework, related to natural colours and colouring foods.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
NATCOL - Natural Food Colours Association represents the international interests of companies and Associations involved in natural food colours and/or Colouring Foods mainly for the food and drink industry. 
 
It is a global organisation based in Europe, but with Members as well as from China, Japan, India and North & South America. 
 
NATCOL is an international non-profit organisation founded in 1979 in Basle, Switzerland. 
 
→The Association has the purpose of promoting the use of natural colours and Colouring Foods in food, feed, cosmetics and pharmaceutical products. It seeks to ensure that the scientific regulatory framework related to natural colours and and/or Colouring Foods in which our members operate is adapted to their industry and customers.
